content.raw:
A RGBD camera in the gazebo 9 simulator published a `/rgbd_camera/depth/points` topic of type `sensor_msgs/PointCloud2` and a `/rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw` topic of type `sensor_msgs/Image`. 

When I run a robot configuration in ignition with a VGA RGBD camera, \(`ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X3 robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_4` or `ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X4 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2`\) there is currently a `/rgbd_camera/depth/points` topic being published, but no `/rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw` topic.
content.html:
A RGBD camera in the gazebo 9 simulator published a /rgbd_camera/depth/points topic of type sensor_msgs/PointCloud2 and a /rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw topic of type sensor_msgs/Image.

When I run a robot configuration in ignition with a VGA RGBD camera, (ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X3 robotConfig1:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_4 or ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X4 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_2) there is currently a /rgbd_camera/depth/points topic being published, but no /rgbd_camera/depth/image_raw topic.
